supply.supply_status: CRITICAL - Post-Crusader depletion. Extended supply lines from Tripoli (800-1000+ km) via single coastal road. British naval interdiction destroys 30-40% of convoys. Fuel reserves 5-6 days (lowest of war). 5 Jan 1942 convoy (55 tanks, 20 armored cars, AT guns) enabled counter-offensive. Capture of British supply dumps at Agedabia/Benghazi critical for sustained operations.
